subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: As he seeks his first major singles title at Wimbledon, Andy Murray has Ivan Lendl in his corner, a man who has won eight Grand Slam singles trophies.
snippet: As he seeks his first major singles title at Wimbledon, Andy Murray has Ivan Lendl in his corner, a man who has won eight Grand Slam singles trophies.
